name: NH Atlanta

reviews.title: Very positive impression
reviews.text: I definitely enjoyed a great location and had a really comfortable stay. The rooms are spacious and very clean. Comfortable air conditioning was really helpful as it was extremely hot period. Tasty breakfast on the top floor made it possible to see nice panorama of Brussels. I found the staff very friendly. It is a big hotel of rather impersonal character, but if you are looking for a comfortable place I strongly recommend this hotel!

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.text: We had some problems checking in,they were also extremely slow.We didnt find the reception staff that friendly.Our room was not cleaned one of the days and the other day the cleaners were banging on our door shouting at 9am!
We were told breakfast was until 11 at reception and we arrived up there at ten one morning and everything was being cleared away.
reviews.title: mmmh...

reviews.text: This hotel is clean and comfortable. The front desk is efficient and helpful. The room was spacious, modern and well appointed. The bathroom was very attractive and clean. Note: hair conditioner was not provided and had to be requested. The bed and pillows were very comfortable. The room was soundproof. The only issue we noticed was the a/c not being able to cool off the room at night to our satisfaction. We did not bother to report this, rather, we opened the window. We liked the location (a 10 minute walk to the north train station), though others might prefer being closer to the Grand Place. We recommend this hotel and would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: excellent

likes.disliked: — could have had better a/c in our room

reviews.text: Hotel is in a good location. A 10 minutes stroll from Grand Place and great bars within staggering distance, e.g. the Lunette.
reviews.title: Good location and hotel
Just on the right side of the tracks
reviews.text: Rooms are a good size and staff are helpful. The only problem we had was with a few minor problems with the shower. Despite telling Reception about it - they were appalled that there was any problem - they did not get fixed by the end of our 3-day stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would like to start off by stating my girlfriend and i traveled all throughout europe and stayed at many different locations. If you follow my user idea you will be able to figure out our trip and you could use this as a guideline for yourself. We did tons of research and used all the sites to make our choices.I hope this review helps.
reviews.title: GREAT HOTEL !!!!

reviews.text: NH Atlanta had an interesting location. We took a cab from the main train station directly to the hotel (about 13 euros). We feel that the hotel had an interesting location because when we were driving to the hotel and you felt as if we were driving through a bad area of town. But once you get closer to the hotel the area is wonderful and safe. Great shopping for anything you would ever need in the area.
reviews.title: Good Rooms and location
Very Nice
reviews.text: Very nice hotel. rooms were very comfortable. Staff was a bit off but they were pleasant. Language barrier seemed to be a problem. All in all I would stay here again.

We stayed in the NH Atlanta for 3 nights, the hotel lives up to 4 star standard with a lovely lobby area and efficent staff, the hotel we found to be very clean and cosy, we stayed in a twin room on the 3rd floor and our room was a good size and could'nt fault it in any way, we also had a balcony and the view was onto a nice side street with lovely surrounding buildings, the bathroom was huge, very clean and had a walk in shower and seperate bath. If you avail of breakfast you find a very impressive view from where breakfast is served on the 9th floor and you can see the whole of the city from there, the food they serve is not bad and there is a big selection of foods to choose from and will cater for all tastes.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.text: After reading the reviews here and finding a very good deal for 2 rooms incl. breakfast for this hotel I booked it. The rooms were spacious and nicely furnished (incl. kettle for tea and/or coffee). My room was very warm and I could not turn the air con to cold neither could I open the window. Without any problems was I given a different room. (Even though I had already unpacked and used the bathroom).
reviews.title: Great rooms and good location

reviews.text: Shower was superb with great power. Location is nice with one of the best Brussel restaurants close by (Seagrill). Highly recommended
reviews.title: Very good

reviews.text: Good location for the weekender and business traveller alike. Rooms were good, staff were professional. Recommended
reviews.title: Wished I'd stayed more than one night

description: Traditional Hotel located in business & shopping area next to Place de Brouckere, 1/2 km from air terminal & Central station.
